languages.text: {n}Очевидно, что перед вами безумная машина разрушения. Нет ничего удивительного в том, что он изливает свои катастрофические откровения в мир — он просто слишком ненавидит его.{/n}

{n}You are evidently looking at a deranged machine built for destruction. It is unsurprising that his apocalyptic outpourings are not directed at anyone in particular. He simply has a burning hatred for all of existence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Очевидно, что перед вами безумная машина разрушения. Нет ничего удивительного в том, что он изливает свои катастрофические откровения в мир — он просто слишком ненавидит его.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It's evident that you're looking at a maddened destruction machine. It's unsurprising that his apocalyptic outpourings aren't directed at anyone in particular. He simply has a burning hatred for all of existence.{/n}

{n}You are evidently looking at a deranged machine built for destruction. It is unsurprising that his apocalyptic outpourings are not directed at anyone in particular. He simply has a burning hatred for all of existence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}De toute évidence, vous avez devant vous une machine de destruction devenue folle. Il n'est pas surprenant que ses propos apocalyptiques ne s'adressent à personne en particulier. Il est simplement animé par une haine brûlante envers toute l'existence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are evidently looking at a deranged machine built for destruction. It is unsurprising that his apocalyptic outpourings are not directed at anyone in particular. He simply has a burning hatred for all of existence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De toute évidence, vous avez devant vous une machine de destruction devenue folle. Il n'est pas surprenant que ses propos apocalyptiques ne s'adressent à personne en particulier. Il est simplement animé par une haine brûlante envers toute l'existence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Salta a la vista que estás ante una máquina enajenada cuyo propósito es destruir. No es de extrañar que sus efusiones apocalípticas no vayan dirigidas contra nadie en particular. Simplemente siente un odio visceral por todo cuanto existe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are evidently looking at a deranged machine built for destruction. It is unsurprising that his apocalyptic outpourings are not directed at anyone in particular. He simply has a burning hatred for all of existence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Salta a la vista que estás ante una máquina de destrucción enajenada. No es de extrañar que sus efusiones apocalípticas no vayan dirigidas contra nadie en particular. Simplemente siente un odio visceral por todo cuanto existe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}很显然，这台为毁灭而生的机器已经彻底发了疯。他关于末日的预言没有针对任何人，仅仅是对一切生者充满了强烈的憎恨，这并没有让你感到意外。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are evidently looking at a deranged machine built for destruction. It is unsurprising that his apocalyptic outpourings are not directed at anyone in particular. He simply has a burning hatred for all of existence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，这台渴望破坏的机器已经发疯了。他关于末日的预言没有针对任何人，仅仅是对一切生者充满了强烈的憎恨，这并没有让你感到意外。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが見ているのは、明らかに破壊のために作られた狂った機械だ。その黙示録的な暴言が特定の誰かに向けられたものではないのはハッキリしている。彼はただ、すべての存在に対して燃えるような憎しみを抱いているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are evidently looking at a deranged machine built for destruction. It is unsurprising that his apocalyptic outpourings are not directed at anyone in particular. He simply has a burning hatred for all of existence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが見ているのは、明らかに狂った破壊機械だ。その黙示録的な暴言が特定の誰かに向けられたものではないのはハッキリしている。彼はただ、すべての存在に対して燃えるような憎しみを抱いているのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du blickst offensichtlich auf eine wahnsinnige Maschine, die nur der Zerstörung dient. Es überrascht nicht, dass seine apokalyptischen Ergüsse an niemanden Bestimmten gerichtet sind. Er empfindet schlicht einen brennenden Hass auf sämtliche Existenz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are evidently looking at a deranged machine built for destruction. It is unsurprising that his apocalyptic outpourings are not directed at anyone in particular. He simply has a burning hatred for all of existence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du blickst offenbar auf eine dem Wahnsinn verfallene Zerstörungsmaschine. Es überrascht nicht, dass seine apokalyptischen Ergüsse an niemanden Bestimmten gerichtet sind. Er empfindet schlicht einen brennenden Hass auf sämtliche Existenz.{/n}
